author: ias
msg: 1. Add support of UTF-16 as required by the spec.
2. notation mark and notation can be omitted.
3. According to http://www.saxproject.org/apidoc/org/xml/sax/ContentHandler.html#skippedEntity(java.lang.String), Non-validating processors may skip entities if they have not seen the declarations.

msg: add repository base to artifact files, they are expected to be absolute
